title: Will i get ECE in PESU RR?
content:
I got a rank of 36xx in KCET 2024. Will i be able to get ECE seat in PESU RR campus through KCET? 

Follow up question: I got in through PESSAT and have gotten my seat there already, will they give any sort of fee concession to the entrance fees because of my KCET rank?

comments.body:
you will get ece in pesu rr   
and you should get refund for everything except the 10k dd ig
you should get it max by round 2 (I had the same rank last year)

You'll get it easy. 

But unless you're interested in electronics i suggest you switch to cs ec campus

Nope, I'm dead set on taking ece. 

I had gotten cse in RR campus through pessat but still took ece there.

No issues man, you'll definitely get it. 

But maybe sticking with pes for ece is not the best. I would suggest also trying for bms and other similar colleges
